aboutpara: I am Ramsha Bilal, a Computer Science senior at New York University with a passion for developing innovative solutions and enhancing user experiences. My expertise spans software development, from building dynamic web applications to implementing robust testing and CI/CD pipelines. I thrive in collaborative environments where I can leverage my skills in Python, C++, Java, and modern web technologies to drive impactful projects.
